Enum TerritoryColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TerritoryColor>
      • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.TerritoryColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TerritoryColor>

    public enum TerritoryColor
extends java.lang.Enum<TerritoryColor>
    A Color acts as the Primary ID for a Player during a given Game.
